org.openscience.cdk.tools.periodictable

Class PeriodicTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.tools.periodictable.PeriodicTable

  • @TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.tools.periodictable.PeriodicTableTest")
public class PeriodicTable
extends Object
    Represents elements of the Periodic Table.

    Though individual elements can be obtained from instances of PeriodicTableElement, this utility class is useful when one wants generic properties of elements such as atomic number, VdW radius etc.

    Author:
    Rajarshi Guha
    Keywords:
    element, periodic table, radius, vanderwaals, electronegativity
    Created on:
    2008-06-12
    Belongs to CDK module:
    core
    Source code:
    HEAD
